1.content:
Will he be a young boy in his late adolescence or grown young man in college or maybe a married father?


(Then choose where in time he lives in)
1.title: The Life of David

11.content: What time period does David live in?
11.title: 14 to 18 years old

choices: He is the son of a farmer, who lives in small settlement.
He is a slave, owned by a tribe of female furries
1152.content: And what is David's position in this harsh and desolate world?
1152.title: The Future (Post-Apocalyptic)

choices: The furry gang was here, demanding a ransom
11521.content:
The world ended. It happened long before you, or your father were born. No one is sure exactly how, some blame these things called "Nukes" other say it was a giant rock that fell from space, but most agree that it doesn't really matter. There's no going back to how things used to be, so you don't think about it much, besides, often time you're far too busy helping your dad at the farm.

The only crop that grew in the dry, cracked earth were these small brown things called tatoes. Most travelers say that tatoe stew tastes horrible, but the taste didn't bother you since you were eating these things your entire life. Your father is kind and loving, despite the horrible weather and uncertainty of the harvest, your father always stays positive. You never knew your mother, and every time you mentioned her around your dad he started getting sad.

Oh, and the are these things called furries. They apparently appeared shortly after the world screwed up, and they look like human/animal hybrids. Some are peaceful and helpful, others not so much. There's this gang of female furries that constantly harasses your settlement, forcing it to pay ransom, and if they don't have enough money the gang kidnaps one of the settlers...

Right now...
11521.title: After the "End"

choices: No deal, she's taking you with them
She agrees, taking your father and leaving you an orpham in the settlement
She decides to take you both as a package deal
115212.content:
"Hey old man. We're here for our money." You hear yelled from outside the settlement walls. You rush to the gate to see the leader of your settlement talking to a large, muscular wolf anthro standing before a large posse of other anthros.

"P-please ma'am. We've had so few travelers lately to trade with. Our money is in short supply as it is and we don't have anywhere near enough to pay you. Just please give us a little more time." Your leader begs.

"Wrong answer pops. You know what that means? Since you can't pay, we'll just take one of you as payment." The wolf says as she eyes the settlement before spotting you at the gate. "That one will do. Get out here." She orders while keeping eye contact with you.

Not knowing what she'd do if you resisted, you meekly walk out past the gate until you stood before her. "How old are you?" She asks.

"E-eighteen, ma'am." You stutter.

"Perfect. That means you're breeding age. You'll do nicely as payment." She says as she grabs your collar and picks you up before preparing to walk off, her crew laughing at the ease she carried you.

You were too stunned by the suddenness of it all to resist. You simply stood there in her grip, unmoving until you heard another voice. "Wait! Stop! Don't take him!" A male voice yells out.

Both you and the wolf turn to see your dad run up. "Please, don't take my son. He's all I have left. I'll give you anything, I'll even take his place if I have to. Just please let him live a normal life here." He begs.

What does the wolf decide?
115212.title: The furry gang was here, demanding a ransom

11533.content:
Before the invention of fire (~200,000 BC)

Another time period
11533.title: Even more time periods.

115332.content:
~300,000 BC (Before Clothing)

Sometime else I guess, running out of ideas...
115332.title: Even further back in time!

1153321.content:
In the Stone Age before clothing, the world was a violent and naked place. Great beasts roamed the land, tribes of humans and furries struggled to create an existence for themselves with the mightiest weapon known to them: a rock. Yes! The great rock! When held by anyone, it can become a hammer, a bludgeon, a projectile, the possibilities are endless!

At least until Urk discovered clothes 100,000 years from now, but his story isn't important here! And neither is Bok's, that guy who discovered fire about 150,000 years from now, ignore that story too, we're focusing on David!

Anyway, for 14 year old David, it would certainly get interesting indeed.

You see, he was either unfortunate or fortunate enough to have gotten lost in the forest when a rouge T-Rex came and ate up his whole tribe, but he did end up stumbling on a furry tribe, so I guess it worked out. For you see, furry birth rates aren't like humans. Where humans have a roughly 50-50 gender ratio, furries have a 99-1 gender ratio, meaning that males are so rare, they are never allowed to do anything remotely dangerous for fear of them hurting themselves and dooming a tribe to extinction.

And David just found one.

But which one?
1153321.title: 300,000 BC

choices: He slipped and fell into the river with them
The vixens spot him and bring him over to their mystics
11533211.content:
David couldn't believe his eyes! There, along the river, were at least 3 groups of four vixens bathing! (Few in this time could count above their fingers and toes, and David, well, math wasn't his strong suit). He saw a few white vixens who seemed to be the mystics of the tribe, most of the vixens had blue designs dyed into their fur, some were elaborate, others were small and simple decorations. Others didn't have any at all.

https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

As he watched the, bathe, the 14 year old was lamenting the fact that he was on the small side, his cousins always made fun of his lanky build, and his lack of ... size, shall we say. He knew women were supposed to like big men, but he never was bothered by it too much, his dad always said he'd grow up eventually. As he stood there in the tree line, he was debating what to do when...
11533211.title: A fox tribe (celtic theme)

choices: The tribe sleeps in one massive fluff-pile, he gets the middle
The tribe sleeps in small groups, he sleeps with the Mystics
115332111.content:
As he flailed around in the river, he finally found a grip on what felt like soft mounds, and he felt a few hands grasping his body and lifting him out. Finally out of the water, he gasped for breath and looked up, and saw that both of his hands were firmly gripped on one of the red vixen's breasts!

"I'm sorry!" He said, quickly removing his hands and waiting for the beatings and shouting to start, but all her heard was feminine giggles around him as he was carried to the rocks where the vixens had been earlier, and he was laid belly down on a rock in front of the three white vixens.

"Who are you?" The lead vixen asked, both her nipples pierced with diecorations that had polished bone shaped like the sun and moon swinging from them, and her fur marked with many of the blue dyed symbols.

"I'm David. I'm lost, and I think my tribe got eaten." He said quietly.

"Are you male, or female?" The eldest mystic asked.

"Uhh, male. See?" He stood up to show them his manhood, and the little tuft of hair that'd grown there a couple weeks ago.

All the vixens stared at him, a few trading smiles as they took in his body.

Eventually, a vixen with close-cropped hair asked "How many winters are you?"

"Fourteen." He replied, the vixens mood dropping comdsiderably with a resounding "Aaawww....."

The lead mystic stood up and addresses the eleven other vixens, "This man is too young for mating, but that does not mean that we cannot raise him."

That got his attention, "Wait, what?" He was ignored, his question drowned out as the various vixens cheered.

The lead mystic continued, "Until a permanent caretaker is chosen, my daughter Snow shall care for him." She gestured to the only white vixen without blue marks or piercings, only the temporary black marks, a young thing who looked extremely nervous and excited at the prospect.

https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

"And for introductions to the rest of us," the Mystic continued, "I am Ice, my sister (the other white vixen with blue marks) is Crystal, you've already been introduced to Snow. And the nine others and their littermates are Ally (multiple braids), Alice, (long single braid), and Alicia (three braids), Beth (blonde hair), Betty (shoulder length brunette), and Bess (cropped back shoulder length brown hair), and finally we have Lilly (short red hair), Linda (short black hair), and Wendy (short brunette).

"So many!" David thought to himself, his own tribe only had two hands worth of people! (That being ten)

"Now come David," Ice said, taking him by the shoulder and making him hold hands with Snow, "We must find shelter for the night, and do not wander too far off, these are dangerous woods."

David and his new tribe wandered into the dark and foreboding woods, he was prepared for an uneasy sleep.
115332111.title: He slipped and fell into the river with them

choices: The tribe encounters Wolves the next morning
1153321111.content:
As David held onto Snow's hand, he noticed how the tribe seemed to be looking for a tree with very thick branches, one of the groups would head under one and check the width of its branches, how thick the canopy was, and how tall the tree was. If it wasn't right, they moved on. As they wandered, he decided to ask Snow some questions.

"Uh, how many winters are you all? You don't seem too old to me." He asked a little cautiously, hie mother having taught him never to ask a women how many winters she had.

Snow smiled back, "The youngest of us, Beth, Betty, and Bess, have eighteen winters, the other six are twenty winters. My mother and her sister have thirty-seven winters, I have nineteen winters."

'All still fairly young too!' David thought to himself, "And why don't you have any males?"

Snow sighed, "It is a curse from moon, mother and all mystics say, that when the world was young and men and furry were yet still beasts, the fox turned from the moon and worshiped the sun. We were split from the wolves and made separate, thinner, weaker. Our Todds, or males as you say, births became rarer and rarer." She gestured to her white fur, "That is why some of us have white fur, that we may commune with the moon to atone for our betrayal and remind us that we were once mighty wolves. In respect, we do not mark our bottoms, or moons, and in exchange, the moon gives to us a male."

David was fascinated, to think the world was so old! And a quick observation showed that, yes, all three of the white vixens had no marks on their bottoms, which swayed so gently and nicely in the moonlight.

"Vixens!" Ice called from up ahead, "A sleeping tree has been found!"

Snow dragged David along to the tree, a massive tree with thick branches that wrapped around its trunk all the way to about three feet off the ground. He could already see the bare bottoms and tails of a few of the vixens as they crawled on their hands and knees under the branches, and he followed Snow under as well.

"David," Ice called from somewhere in the fluff pile, "get to the center, as our new male, we must keep you safe, comfortable, and warm."

Not wanting to refuse that offer, he eagerly and carefully crawled over the boxers until he was laying in the middle of them. It was very comfortable, he felt a few arms wrap around his torso, his head was definitely nestled between two pairs of breasts as two vixens laying the opposite way rested their heads on his belly and chest. His hands he was pretty sure were caressing the bare bottoms of some vixens.

And someone had their head laying on his crotch, that certainly didn't help him relax...

A giggle as he lost the battle with his manhood's reaction to all this, "So eager," the vixen said, pressing it down with her chin, "but first you must grow before you are a true Todd."

It was both a restless and extremely comfortable night for David.
1153321111.title: The tribe sleeps in one massive fluff-pile, he ...

choices: Another furry tribe arrives and wants the berries
David and the tribe enjoy their meal
11533211111.content:
Stretching in the morning for David used to be a fairly boring affair, but now that's he was in the center of the fluff-pile, he found himself caressing several vixens in ways he didn't mean. Case in point, his hands ended up grabbing a breast from two separate vixens, Lilly and Linda to be precise, who simply laughed off the unintentional grope. He also was treated to a show of tail, butt, and intimate regions as the various vixens crawled out from under the tree on their hands and knees, him following behind them.

"Vixens!" Ice called out, the three sets of triplet vixens looking to their mystic, "Now we must find food, bring what you can, David shall go with Lilly, Linda and Wendy today for food gathering." The triplet set in question cheered, dragging him over and hugging him tightly, their massive breasts almost smoothing him in a furry marshmallow heaven.

"Lets go David!" Lilly said excitedly, grabbing his hand and following her sisters as they ventured into the forest. "Look for berries, animals, roots, anything that looks edible, we'll teach you what's is and isn't."

David nodded and watched the vixens' behinds bounce and jiggle as they walked in front of him, their tails wagging from side to side, teasing him with a view of their behinds and more intimate regions.

He even saw Linda bend over at the waist to pick berries from a bush, using her large breasts as an improvised bowl when she was finished (woodworking and weaving haven't been invented yet, nor the concept of using a large leaf). And as Lilly and Wendy led him through the forest, he watched Wendy take off running through the trees, before hearing her growling and a brief scuffle happen, and she emerged with two medium sized rabbits dangling from her hands. "Meet you two back at camp!" She skipped happily through the trees, he massive breasts almost clonking her in the head several times.

"What does she mean?" David asked, curious about the phrasing of her statement.

Lilly smiled, "We can't return to the tree until we have food." She shrugged, gently straightening his hair, "That way the tribe always has enough for everyone. But since your new, we'll let you slide at first."

David sighed, "Good, I wasn't much of a hunter with my family."

Lilly smiled, "I think I see some berries up ahead, lets grab as man you as we can!"
11533211111.title: Finding food the next morning

choices: Nah, lets get even simpler!  (If that's even possible)
1153322.content:
Well, we could go to ~700,000 BC which has no clothes, no fire, and barely any language. Which is not to say that everyone is stupid or anything, but just that the concepts of such things don't exist yet.

Unless you want even further back?
1153322.title: Sometime else

11533221.content:
Alrighty, so here we are, at the dawn of language, and long before clothes or fire were ever discovered, and young David is wandering the wilderness, gathering berries and eating whatever small animals he's able to catch. When he suddenly stumbled on a group of voluptuous furry women!

But of what pack? And yes, I do mean pack, the concept of tribes being semi-permanent alliances of many families hasn't happened yet.

A pack of pretty vixens?

Or something else?
11533221.title: Yes, ~700,000 BC it is!

choices: Come out and see if they accept him
Gather enough food to try and make an offering
115332211.content:
Peaking through the bushes, David saw six fox-girls bathing in a nearby pond! The two white furred ones seemed to be the leaders, while the others were swimming around, occasionally pulling a clam or fish out of the water to eat.

https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

(I know this is used in the other branch, but that was from my old account and I wrote myself into having too many characters and lost interest, this rewrite should make it easier for me)

He looked at them eagerly, wanting to join their pack, but had nothing aside from being male.... he could also try to gather enough food to make an offering, but what should he do?
115332211.title: The vixens!

choices: The vixens take him to their den
They feed and groom him on the shore
1153322111.content:
David realized that he didn't know the area enough to gather food for an offering, so he took a deep breath and stepped out to the shore, immediately getting the attention of the vixens, who all turned their heads in his direction. He paled a bit when he saw them all raise their hackles and growl a bit before the two white vixens waved their arms around in a placating gesture.

"Male." Was what they were saying, the red vixens stopped growling and cocked their heads to the side, cooing in curiosity.

David gulped as the six vixens waded their way across the shallow river to his location on the shore, the six surrounding him and letting the two leading vixens, the white ones, step closer.

They smiled at him as they leaned in and sniffed him all over, the first one sniffing his chest and experimentally licking his chest, while the other one was doing the same to his back. David would be lying if he said he didn't like the attention.

He yelped, startled, when the vixen behind him stuck her nose in his butt and sniffed, causing him to jump forward into the vixen sniffing his chest, and because of his relative youth, somewhere between fourteen and sixteen winters old, his face landed right in her ample bosoms.

"Eh-heh-heh." He awkwardly chuckled as he tried to dislodge himself, but found himself in a tight hug, his face mashed between the furry breasts. The only eye he had not blocked could see the smiles of the surrounding vixens, and he hoped that whatever was going on was good for him and not bad...
1153322111.title: Come out and see if they accept him

122.content: Alright, we've established a "how" and a "when" now how about a "where"?
122.title: The Renaissance (1300-1700)

choices: A peasant in a human/anthro village
A loyal servant to a female anthro warlord
1221.content: Alright, last question, what is David?
1221.title: Feudal Japan

12211.content:
Nobody knew how it happened, but over 1000 years ago something happened where a new intelligent race appeared in the world. Dubbed "furries" by the world, their origin was a mystery to all. Some believe that they were people punished by the gods, while others see them as divine beings themselves.

No matter where they came from, it was of little concern to you. Your clan ruled over a large domain on the island of Settsu for generations. You had neighboring clans on the island, but the majority of it was your domain. Your father had passed recently, leaving you as head of the clan.

You had plans for this island. You wanted to unite this island under your control, and you've been making it happen. You awoke in your castle. It was a grand palace that rivaled the emperor's itself. Your halls had no shortage of guards, servants, and concubines, human and furry alike.

How will you start the day?
12211.title: My lord

choices: Talk terms with the northern clan
122111.content:
It's time to see how your plans are going. You seek out Erik. He's a leopard furry who's your most trusted advisor and closest friend since childhood. None of the gains you're made so far would be possible without his help. You find him coordinating the guard captains. "Erik. We need to talk." He dismisses the guards and turns to you.

"My lord, how may I be of service?"

"First, we've been friends since we were both kids, you can drop the formalities when we're alone. Call me Divid."

"Yes my lo... David." He says with a bow.

"Second, tell me how things are going with expanding into new territory."

"As you are well aware David, there are only two clans that remain on Settsu that pose any true threat to us, one to the north and one to the south. Peace talks with the northern clan have been going well, they say they are willing to join us, but their leader requests that you meet with her personally. The southern clan still refuses to surrender, we currently have them pushed back to their castle and are laying siege to them as we speak." He explains.

"What can you tell me about their leader."

"She's stubbern and fearless. Commanding her troops with absolute respect. But they may be willing to defect if you personally lead the attack. So David, you have two clans in two separate directions that demand your personal attention. Which will you do?"
122111.title: See how expansion is going

choices: He's an artist looking for models
1222.content: So what's David up to in Italy?

choices: A settler, who is the sole survivor of a native anthro raid

info.brief_description: This is a story of a human's "encounters" with female furries in different time-periods
info.description:
You will follow David in his adventures in different time-periods. Past, present and future. And he will encounter hot female furries, and they will lust for him!

(They will be at human height)
